[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Declare(
        Declare {
            span: Span(
                1,
                7,
            ),
            entries: DeclareEntryGroup {
                start: Span(
                    1,
                    14,
                ),
                end: Span(
                    1,
                    20,
                ),
                entries: [
                    DeclareEntry {
                        key: SimpleIdentifier {
                            span: Span(
                                1,
                                15,
                            ),
                            value: "A",
                        },
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            16,
                        ),
                        value: String(
                            LiteralString {
                                value: "B",
                                span: Span(
                                    1,
                                    17,
                                ),
                            },
                        ),
                    },
                ],
            },
            body: Braced {
                start: Span(
                    1,
                    22,
                ),
                statements: [
                    Echo {
                        echo: Span(
                            1,
                            24,
                        ),
                        values: [
                            Literal(
                                String(
                                    LiteralString {
                                        value: "Hello, world!",
                                        span: Span(
                                            1,
                                            29,
                                        ),
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                        ],
                        ending: Semicolon(
                            Span(
                                1,
                                44,
                            ),
                        ),
                    },
                ],
                end: Span(
                    1,
                    46,
                ),
            },
        },
    ),
]
